author: Cambria Bold
title: 10 Snazzy Ways to Organize and Store Small Appliances — Organizing Inspiration from The Kitchn
text:
Share 
Some small appliances have all the luck. Instead of getting shoved in the back of a cupboard or left to gather dust on a bottom shelf, these small appliances get the red carpet treatment, with pull-out shelves and hidden cabinets devoted entirely to storing them in style and comfort. Ah, it's good to be a small appliance — at least if you're in one of these kitchens! 
Appliance garages have gone by the wayside , which is why many of these solutions are what I'd call the new appliance garage — namely, just a smart area (usually a designated cabinet) where small appliances can sit neatly and comfortably within reach. 
Even — or maybe especially! — microwaves benefit from this strategy. Those bulky machines look positively streamlined when fit snugly into a cabinet or shelf. 
Chances are, you don't have room for a setup that could even come close to any of these (I know I don't!), but that doesn't mean they're not fun to look at. 
How do you store your small appliances? Do you have a special setup that keeps things neat and tidy?
